CONFIG.description: The configuration for a trivia session.

bot_plays.description: Whether or not the bot gains points during the session. Defaults to true.

delay.description: Answer time limit in seconds, must be positive number greater than 0.0. Defaults to 15.0.

max_score.description: Number of points required in order win the trivia, must be positive integer. Defaults to 10.

payout_multiplier.description: The payout multiplier, must be positive number. Defaults to 0.0.

reveal_answer.description: Whether or not to reveal the answer when the question times out. Defaults to true.

timeout.description: Timeout per question in seconds, must be positive number greater than 0.0. Defaults to 120.0.

use_spoilers.description: Whether to use spoiler markdown when revealing question answers. Defaults to false.
